response.overview: In the Cosmic Year of 2303, C.O.P. Agents Carol Vanderson and Valence Celest take on Reinhold City’s eclectic underground in pursuit of an artifact that could swing the entire balance of the cosmos—which direction? Depends on who holds the case at the end of the night.
response.tagline: Seven Killers. One Case. No Backup.
response.title: One Night in Reinhold City
